vecHighlight.strDescription: 手牌、抽牌堆、弃牌堆总计牌数小于等于3张。

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 在只剩1点生命的情况下赢得一场战斗。
在一场战斗中以中毒效果打败3名敌人。
在一场战斗中消耗20张牌。
在一个回合中拥有9点能量。
不受任何伤害打败一名Boss。
不出攻击牌赢得一场战斗。
用故障机器人打通游戏。
在单个敌人身上施加99层或以上中毒。
在战斗中拥有99点或以上格挡。

data.strFullDescription:
你可以通过如下操作将游戏语言设置为简体中文：点击游戏菜单中的“Settings”选项，在设置窗口中将右下角的“Language”从“English”改为“Chinese (Simplified)”，然后重新启动游戏。
[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/646570/extras/store_silent.gif?t=1576536521[/img]
我们将卡牌游戏与Roguelike游戏融为一体，制作出了这款最棒的单机组牌游戏。打造出独一无二的牌组、遇见无数离奇的生物、发现威力强大的遗物、去屠戮这座高塔吧！

[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/646570/extras/store_ironclad.gif?t=1576536521[/img]
[h2][b]游戏特色[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*][i]动态构建的牌组[/i]：谨慎选择你的卡牌！在攀爬高塔的途中邂逅百余张不同的卡牌，选择是否将它们加入你的牌组，通过组合和搭配来让牌组发挥力量，打败敌人、挑战登顶。
[*][i]不断变化的高塔[/i]：每次开始爬塔的旅程时，高塔的构造都会发生变化。是选择高风险高回报，还是谨慎前行？面对不同的敌人、选择不同的卡牌、发现不同的遗物、甚至挑战不同的Boss！
[*][i]威力强大的遗物[/i]：在塔中你将发现名为遗物的各种强大物品，这些遗物可能会与你的牌组产生强大的化学反应，让你的战力得到飞跃。但也不要过于大意，为了获得遗物，有时你所付出的代价，可会超过区区金钱……[/list]

[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/646570/extras/store_defect.gif?t=1576536521[/img]
[h2][b]《Slay the Spire》已经结束抢先体验，目前游戏共有下述内容：[/b][/h2]
[list]
[*]三名核心角色，各自拥有独特的牌组。
[*]250多张可用的卡牌。
[*]150多种可被找到的物品与道具。
[*]50多场完全不同的战斗。
[*]50多件神秘的事件，可能给你带来帮助，也可能将你害得很惨。
[*]每日挑战模式，让你可以在进行独特游戏的同时，与世界各地的玩家们比较你的表现。
[*]自定模式，让你可以自由混合各种疯狂的特殊效果。
[/list]

[img]https://media.st.dl.bscstorage.net/steam/apps/646570/extras/store_merchant.gif?t=1576536521[/img]
data.strSnippet: 我们将卡牌游戏与Roguelike游戏融为一体，制作出了这款最棒的单机组牌游戏。打造出独一无二的牌组、遇见无数离奇的生物、发现威力强大的遗物、去屠戮这座高塔吧！

data.title: Act Like It
data.short_description: This is a framework for the creation of custom acts. I hope that this motivates folks to get creative as it should get rid of a bulk of the "how the hell do I even start with this". Sourcecode as well as a how-to guide are available under https://github.co

data.title: ModTheSpire
data.short_description: ModTheSpire is the mod loader for Slay the Spire. You must subscribe to ModTheSpire if you want to play with mods. If you're interested in creating mods for Slay the Spire, check out the BaseMod wiki. If you'd like to contribute to the code behind ModTheSp

data.title: Hyrulean Artifacts
data.short_description: THIS MOD IS CURRENTLY BETA ONLY This mod adds in a new custom daily modifier that adds in new Legend of Zelda inspired relics! Elites and chests now drop Triforce pieces you can collect to assemble more powerful relics and you can collect other various ite

data.title: BaseMod
data.short_description: BaseMod is an open-source API for modding Slay the Spire. It provides an extra layer on top of ModTheSpire's low-level API to make the creation of mods easier. BaseMod provides such things as: A dev console Adding new characters Adding new cards Adding new

data.title: Upgraded Defect
data.short_description: A bunch of modified and new cards for the Defect. Replace the base cards. Currently the mod features 43 cards and 3 relics UpgradedDefectMod gives the Defect : - some more claw scaling - more frost generation and synergies - some new orb-based effects - so

data.title: The Slimebound
data.short_description: The Slimebound mod primarily features a new character, the Slimebound. Take on the role of a rogue, sentient Acid Slime, who has decided to conquer the Spire instead of serving its master in the Exordium. This character attempts to stay within the bounds o

data.title: Small Relic Pack
data.short_description: A small pack of 7 relics and 1 event based on various franchises, from Jojo to Konosuba. This mod was commissioned by VideoJames, and you could commission any mod idea you have too! Contact me on Steam or Discord at Vex'd#2468 for more information.

data.title: StSLib
data.short_description: StSLib is an open-source group of generalized common keywords, mechanics, relic hooks, and power hooks for mod makers to use in order to avoid each mod maker needing to re-implement the same code over and over. If you're creating mods for Slay the Spire an

data.title: Bartender

data.title: The Servant
